site_name: Hillside, 51 Jacksons Lane, Hornsey, London, N6 5SR
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
Related Proposals	Previous Investigation
Work to investigate the damage to the property from the Thames Water Foul and Surface Water sewer collapses in the adjoining roadway were proposed in Listed Building Application No. HGY/2023/0603 dated 01/03/23. Consent for investigation was Granted by email dated 23/05/23. The Investigations were undertaken by Messrs Sandberg LLP Consulting Engineers on 11/07/23 and the results are contained in their Report 71590/S/1 Basement Survey dated 25/07/23. A copy of this Report is attached for reference.
It was found that no voids were identified in the mortar joints nor in the soil in front of the external walls, at the locations selected.
description: Listed Building Consent for works to basement area involving repair and decoration to address damage.
